about_the_game:
Welcome to Hag, a first-person horror escape room puzzler that will leave you terrified and questioning your every move. In this game, you play as an unsuspecting victim who finds themselves trapped in the home of a sadistic hag and her morbid son.

As you explore the dark and ominous house, you'll encounter an array of intricate puzzles and obstacles that will test your wits and challenge your ability to survive. With each passing moment, the tension and fear will mount as you uncover the true horrors that lie within this cursed dwelling.

The hag and her son, both notorious for their malevolent tendencies, have long been rumored to dabble in dark magic and unspeakable acts of cruelty. As you delve deeper into their twisted world, you'll uncover an unknown mystery that will keep you guessing until the very end.

Your goal is simple: escape the clutches of the hag and her morbid son before it's too late. But be warned - this won't be an easy task. You'll need to use all of your cunning and strategy to outsmart your captors and uncover the secrets of the house before it's too late.

Are you brave enough to face the horrors that await you in Hag? With its spine-tingling atmosphere, puzzling gameplay, and unknown mystery to solve, this game is not for the faint of heart. Enter if you dare.

HAG - The study room

Anyone up for puzzling their way out of the morbid crevasses of a deranged soul and no it's not your tax agent. Welcome to HAG The study room.
